Title: Building the Tianlan railway
Designer: Yang Ziqiang (杨自强)Huang Naiyuan (黄乃源)Sun Yisheng (孙宜生)Liu Ping (刘苹)
Publisher: Xibei renmin chubanshe (西北人民出版社)
Notes: Building railways has a high priority in the early 1950s. The two men below right in the brown suits are Soviet engineers, sent to China to help build up the infrastructure and industry.The Tianlan railway runs between Tianshui (天水) and Lanzhou (兰州).
